This crap makes my blood boil. All this does is promote racism. ALL LIVES MATTER! Not just a certain group of people.

It seems that many people think that the city should have found these people somewhere to go. Honestly, would you want them as your neighbor? I'm guessing the answer from most people is no. Some of the people were offered other places to go, but didn't want to because it wasn't convenient for them. They expect everything to be handed to them and then they leave behind all of this garbage. Sure they may not have had trucks to move the large stuff in, but needles? Are you kidding me, they could have at least picked up their addiction and taken it with them. If they have money for drugs, they have money to live. The few who work and are struggling get caught in the stream of all of those who don't work and choose to use drugs instead of providing for themselves. I'm sorry, but it's high time that they start contributing to their own care. I can almost guarantee that if you went and told each of those people that you would provide housing for them if they worked on your farm or at your business, they would laugh in your face! Try it and you'll see what I mean!
My God! Who is running things over there? It's embarrassing.

It's a tragic accident and I'm sure the Mother feels worse than any of us do. RIP gorilla, sorry u lived in a world run by humans who incarcerate n display majestic wild animals for our petty amusement which I'm sure we have absolutely no right to do. Hope the zoo shuts down and its funding is used to preserve wild sanctuary for animals. Humans can watch animals on TV as we don't deserve to be close to them because we r incapable of defending ourselves without bullets.
